name: Find the Exit by Out Bush
name_original: Find the Exit by Out Bush
description:
Find the Exit

==== === ====

Story:

=====

Smiley is stuck within a Rectangular grid and has to Find the location of the Exit which has been randomly placed somewhere on the Grid at the same time Smiley has to avoid Grumpy whose out to get him. 

There are 5 stages to get through with each stage becomming smaller and Grumpy also moves faster, the game returns to stage 1 if stage 5 is completed or Grumpy gets Smiley.

Controls:

========

Use Cursor Keys to move Smiley Left, Right, Up & Down.

Requirements:

============

Any Amstrad CPC Emulator should do the job, I have supplied Tape Images (CDT file) as well as an DISC Image (DSK file). I've tested this game with Locomotive BASIC 1.0 using Winape 2.0 Alpha 18, and it should work fine with Locomotive BASIC 1.1.
